alert.note: Alert for Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 1:57AM MST until November 28 at 9:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Mountains of Southwestern Montana south of Interstate 90, and Gallatin Valley. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Gallatin Valley zone, snow accumulations will increase from northwest to southeast across the zone, with lower accumulations northwest of Bozeman.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
